item.title: project pegasus
item.description: Helping Unicorns Fly. To begin with a little background about me: I grew up in Bangalore, India (the silicon valley of India, and rightly so in my opinion). I have always been senisitive to and influenced by the communities around me. Main reason ‚Üí I grew up going to just one school from age 2-17. I went through the foundational years of my life growing up with the same cohort of about 80 kids, and I am truly grateful for this experience because:

item.title: timeline
item.description: üìÑ Resume 2022 Software Engineering Intern @MealMe , San Francisco CA Jan. 2022 - Present Aggregated 10+ delivery services in USA & CAN (many hundred thousand stores and restaurants) to MealMe‚Äôs selection of services for ordering food, groceries, laundry, etc. ‚Üí improved Series A metric. Accelerated compilation time of search engine, increased speed by 64x. Sped up crawling algorithm, which crawls and adds 2 stores/second to our database ‚Üí key Series A metric.

item.title: about me
item.description: “Finished products are for decadent minds.” - Bail Channis, Second Foundation Hi üëã I’m Rohit, a fourth year Computer Science undergrad at the University of Waterloo. Originally, I come from Bangalore, India, informally known as the Silicon Valley of India, and rightly so in my opinion. I witnessed the growth of myriad small businesses1 (into large national and multi-national corporations) throughout my childhood, and thought to myself, “If they can do it, why not me?
